name: PreviewPlatform
desc: Platforms that can run the preview.

items.name: case iOS
items.desc: Specifies iOS as the preview platform.

items.name: case macOS
items.desc: Specifies macOS as the preview platform.

items.name: case tvOS
items.desc: Specifies tvOS as the preview platform.

items.name: case watchOS
items.desc: Specifies watchOS as the preview platform.

items.name: static func == (PreviewPlatform, PreviewPlatform) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two preview platforms are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two preview platforms are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the preview platform by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the preview platform.
